    • decode

      Map<String,Object> decode(String token)
      Decodes and verifies a JWT token string and extracts claims into a Map.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      claims of decoded token.

    • encode

      String encode(org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken accessToken, org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.OAuth2Authentication authentication)

      Parameters:

      authentication - of the token.
      Returns:

    • isRefreshToken

      boolean isRefreshToken(org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken token)
      Checks whether a token is access-token or refresh-token. Based on additional-information ati which contains the reference to access token of a refresh token.
